name: Business Tools
description: Tools for productivity, project management, and business operations

tools.name: Slack
tools.description: A messaging platform for teams that brings all your communication together in one place.

tools.name: Asana
tools.description: Organize work and projects so teams know what to do, why it matters, and how to get it done.

tools.name: Trello
tools.description: A visual tool for organizing your work and life using boards, lists, and cards.

tools.name: Notion
tools.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, docs, knowledge base, and project management.

tools.name: Google Analytics
tools.description: Web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic and user behavior.

tools.name: Zapier
tools.description: Automate workflows by connecting your favorite apps and services together.

tools.name: Calendly
tools.description: Scheduling software that eliminates the back-and-forth emails to find the perfect time.

tools.name: HubSpot
tools.description: CRM platform with marketing, sales, service, and website management tools.

tools.name: Monday.com
tools.description: Work operating system that powers teams to run projects and workflows with confidence.
